TNP.longDescription: Line item Qty * Price including charges, allowances, and taxes

UCP.longDescription: Price retailer pays vendor for goods

VPC.longDescription: Price the vendor or supplier suggests it to be sold at

WHL.longDescription: Price supplier/produce sells to a retailer/buyer, generally less than List Price

UnitPrice.description: Price as defined by the PriceTypeIDCode

UnitPriceBasis.description: Code specifying the type of unit price for an item

UnitPriceBasisMultiplier.description: Value to be used as a modifier to obtain a new UnitPriceBasis.

PriceMultiplierQual.description: Code indicating the type of price multiplier

PriceMultiplier.description: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new price

RebateAmount.description: Amount that is returned to the buying party

QuantityUOM.description: The unit of measure in relation to an amount

AM.longDescription: A sealed glass capsule containing a liquid

DB.longDescription: Weight of the item when dry.  Qualifier should only be used if distinction is needed between pounds and dry pounds [i.e. pounds of wet cement vs. dry cement]

DD.longDescription: Used to describe angles. This is not to be used to describe temperatures.

DE.longDescription: Equal to 1.375 cubic feet in the United States. Typically used to measure wood

DWT.longDescription: Used in the valuation and measurement of precious metals. Equal to 24 grains, 120 of a troy ounce, and 1.55517384 grams.

FZ.longDescription: Equal to 1/20 of an Imperial Pint, or 28.416 milliliters

JO.longDescription: Usually used for ordering pipe. In this context a joint is a section of pipe, usually of predetermined length.

LS.longDescription: Often used when a sum is pre-negotiated outside of an order

PER.longDescription: The proportion or share in relation to the whole.

PSI.longDescription: Pressure a gas or liquid exerts on the walls of its container

Q1.longDescription: One of a set of four 3-month divisions of a year

VAR.longDescription: A unit that is used to measure reactive power in AC circuits

ZC.longDescription: One of two 6-month divisions of a year

MultiplePriceQuantity.description: Quantity of units for a given price [i.e. 3 for $10.00].

ClassOfTradeCode.description: Self defined categories used to indicate who is authorized to view or use the related price information contained in the PriceInformation or PricingType group

ConditionValue.description: Identifies a condition applied to a price

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

ProductCharacteristicCode.description: Code defining/classifying the type of description being sent

RE.longDescription: Used to indicate when a product or item is requested to be returned to the manufacturer, usual due to safety or product defects

VI.longDescription: Describes a specific vintage or, special release, of a libation [i.e. Wine, Beer, Spirits]. If only the year of harvest, production, or packaging is being communicated, the Dates group should be used.

AgencyQualifierCode.description: Identifies the agency from which code values are sourced

DD.longDescription: A department of the federal executive branch entrusted with formulating military policies and maintaining American military forces [DOD]

NEMA.longDescription: The items rating as defined by the National Electrical Manufacturers Association [NEMA]

ProductDescription.description: Free-form textual description of the product

SourceSubqualifier.description: Code as defined by the AgencyQualifierCode

YesOrNoResponse.description: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

LanguageCode.description: Code designating the language used in text. ISO 639 language code

items.description: This group is to link item attributes that are talking about the same part of the item. Only once per MasterItemAttribute can a specific ItemAttributeQualifier be used
This group describes a part of an item

ItemAttributeQualifier.description: Code identifying the part of an item being described.

ABPF.longDescription: A measure of how much ethanol is contained in an alcoholic beverage

ABRS.longDescription: Indicates resistance to wear caused by contact with another surface

ACRI.longDescription: Provides a product part number which the accessory is intended to be used for

ACS.longDescription: Indicates or describes additional items included with the original product

ACSY.longDescription: Indicates if the item is an accessory for another item

ACT.longDescription: Describes the length and texture of the animals coat that the item uses

ACTV.longDescription: Describes how the item becomes ready to use

ADDR.longDescription: Explains why the represented item is being added to the product offering

ADJS.longDescription: Indicates if the item's strap can be adjusted

ADLT.longDescription: Indicates if the item is directed at adult consumers and not intended for underage consumers

ADMO.longDescription: Indicates if the item's mount can be adjusted and describes how it can be adjusted

ADR.longDescription: Describes the brand or type of adhesive that is recommended to use with the product

AER.longDescription: Indicates if a product contains a compressed gas or propellant

AFF.longDescription: Indicates if an item's style is flat fronted

AFTG.longDescription: Indicates if the item is considered anti-fatigue

AFTP.longDescription: Describes the type of substance or device used to conceal or remove an odor from the surrounding air

AING.longDescription: Components that biologically activate the product effectiveness

AIOD.longDescription: Indicates if all functional components of the item are included in a single unit, and indicates the components included in the unit

AIR.longDescription: The amount of air that flows through a particular device

AJOB.longDescription: Indicates if the item is outfitted to remove parallax

ALCF.longDescription: Indicates whether or not the item is free of alcoholic compounds.

ALI.longDescription: Number of audio input jacks available for a device

ALMT.longDescription: Descirbes the orientation of the item

ALO.longDescription: Number of audio output jacks available for a device

ALTM.longDescription: Indicates if the item has an altimeter, describes the type of altimeter, and provides any associated measurements

AMMF.longDescription: Indicates whether or not the item is free of ammonia.

ANMN.longDescription: Describes the type of nutrition intended for consumption by domestic animals that the item represents and provides any associated measurements

ANSI.longDescription: The name and number of a standard the item meets or exceeds based on ANSI standards

ANTR.longDescription: Describes the type of item used for animal training that is represented and provides any associated measurements

AO.longDescription: U.S. Federal Trade Commission [FTC] protection for Made in USA claims. In Canada, labeling requirements as defined by the Consumer Packaging Act and the Textile Labeling Act

AOIN.longDescription: Indicates the subject matter an item can be categorized under based on interest, topic, or theme

AOU.longDescription: Indicates whether item is approved for use both indoors and outdoors

APL.longDescription: Indicates recommendations or how to best use the product [i.e. Oil paint to be used on wood or metal. Tylenol usage for minor aches and pains]

APLG.longDescription: Descirbes where the garment falls on a person

APMD.longDescription: Indicates the method in which the product is applied to a given surface or item and provides any associated measurements

APPL.longDescription: The legal geographical place of origin for the item [i.e. Wines, Cheeses]

ARM.longDescription: Descibes the type of arm the item has

ARMR.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains armor and describes the type of armor used

ARPF.longDescription: Indicates and describes the material contained in an item that requires removal by airport security

ARS.longDescription: Indicates the minimum age required to purchase products

ARTF.longDescription: Indicates whether or not the item is artificial, indicates the type of artificial product used, and provides any associated measurements

ARTS.longDescription: The performing creator of a represented artwork to include musical, theatrical, and film performers as well as visual artists.

ASC.longDescription: Descibes the stance of the athlete or player

ASHT.longDescription: Indicates if the item has an automatic shutoff

ASM.longDescription: Includes an item's assembly instructions and indicates if it is required to be assembled by the consumer

ATD.longDescription: Describes where the anti-theft device is attached to an item and if it has one

ATH.longDescription: Author of written work [i.e. books, articles, etc.]

ATTT.longDescription: Describes the types of things that can attach to the item

AW.longDescription: Describes the item weight[s] and if it can be modified

AWRC.longDescription: Name of a specific award or recognition given to the product
examples: Best New Product, Satisfaction - J.D Power and Associates

BARC.longDescription: Indicates whether or not the product has a barcode, the number shown on the barcode, and the type of barcode used

BASU.longDescription: Indicates if the item is the lowest level of the product's hierarchy.  This may or may not be the same as the Consumer Unit

BAT.longDescription: Indicates if batteries are included with an item and, if applicable, the type of batteries

BB.longDescription: Describes the type of base on a bulb

BBCL.longDescription: Describes the color of the output from the light or bulb

BBL.longDescription: Describes the expected life span of the bulb

BBP.longDescription: Indicates if an item supports a battery backup

BBRL.longDescription: Indicates the measurement or description of the barrel of a baseball or softball bat

BBS.longDescription: Describes the measurement of the band of the bra

BC.longDescription: Describes the material that makes up the core of the ball

BCHF.longDescription: Indicates if the item uses a batch feed system

BCK1.longDescription: Describes the main backing used for the product. Typically used with flooring

BCK2.longDescription: Describes the secondary backing used for the product. Typically used with flooring

BCKM.longDescription: Describes the material the back of the product is made of

BCKP.longDescription: Describes the type of panel that is on the back of the product

BCS.longDescription: Describes the cup size of the bra

BDMT.longDescription: Describes the material of the item's blade and provides any associated measurements

BDPT.longDescription: Describes the area of the body associated with the item

BDRP.longDescription: Describes the length to weight ratio of a baseball or softball bat

BDSZ.longDescription: Indicates a standard bed size pertaining to a represented item

BFCT.longDescription: Describes the type of briefcase or portfolio case the product represents and provides any associated measurements

BGFT.longDescription: Measures the bridge of the nose, and describes the style of the fit

BIMC.longDescription: Indicates if the microphone is integrated with the item

BIND.longDescription: The resulting product of attaching or joining two or more different parts to make a whole.

BKAJ.longDescription: Indicates whether the back of the item is adjustable

BKCV.longDescription: Indicates the represented book's cover type. If users wish to describe electronic books, use Media Format 1 to indicate file types.

BKHT.longDescription: Indicates the type of back height.

BKMT.longDescription: Describes the material of the represented book's cover, and provides any associated measurements

BKMX.longDescription: Indicates the maximum height of the back of an item when fully extended

BLD.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains a bladder and describes the material of the bladder, if different than the outer material

BLDE.longDescription: Measures the amount of blade that is usable below the base

BLDM.longDescription: Measures the blade that comes with the item, or required size of a replacement blade

BLE.longDescription: Describes the type of edging on the item's blade and the number of edges with this type

BLPT.longDescription: Indicates the boiling point of a liquid and identifies the liquid

BLS.longDescription: Describes the shape of the blade

BLTP.longDescription: Describes the type of kinetic projectile that is expelled from a firearm during shooting and provides any associated measurements

BLWR.longDescription: Describes the type of blower the item uses

BND.longDescription: Describes the type, and inidcates the amount of bend the item has

BNTM.longDescription: The length of time before the amount of emitted light is no longer useful

BPAF.longDescription: Indicates that the item does not contain Bisphenol A [BPA]

BPE.longDescription: Describes the type of blade curve such as lie, depth, curve, face, that a specific player uses

BPY.longDescription: The year in which production of the item began. Used with items that have multi-year production cycles [i.e. Wine]

BRAF.longDescription: Identifies a special function or feature of the bra other than its primary purpose

BRC.longDescription: Indicates if the item is capable of playing Blu-ray discs

BRD.longDescription: Describes the breed of animal the item is intended for

BRGT.longDescription: The amount of visable light emitted by the item

BRM.longDescription: Describes the material the bearing is made from

BRN.longDescription: A distinctive name identifying a product as resold by another entity. This may or may not be trademarked

BRNS.longDescription: Number of burners the item contains and describes the burner

BRQ.longDescription: Indicates if an item requires a battery to operate

BRR.longDescription: Describes the rating of the bearing

BRST.longDescription: Describes the style of bra being represented

BRT.longDescription: Describes the style of bearing used in the item and provides the count of rolling elements

BRWT.longDescription: Describes the method of brewing to create the final product

BS.longDescription: Used to measure the height and circumference of the boot shaft

BSCV.longDescription: Value assigned to the curvature of the front surface of the frame

BSN.longDescription: Describes the type of basin, and counts the number of basins of the item

BT.longDescription: Indicates the type of bulb used with the item

BTL.longDescription: Describes the maximum battery run time

BTS.longDescription: Describes the battery size needed for a product

BTST.longDescription: Describes the maximum battery standby time

BU.longDescription: Indicates if the item has Bluetooth technology and describes the frequency

BUL.longDescription: Describes the shape and amount of bulbs included

BVRG.longDescription: Describes the type of drink the product is classified as

BYCY.longDescription: The maximum amount of weight for a material denser than water that the object is rated to support.

CAB.longDescription: Indicates the measurements and description of the cable

CALF.longDescription: Number of calories from fat per serving

CALP.longDescription: Indicates whether or not the item (lumber product) requires a point of sale 1 percent assessment in the state of California. For more information visit: https://www.cdtfa.ca.gov/industry/lumber-products.htm

CANH.longDescription: Describes the type of item used to hold a candle and provides any associated measurements

CARG.longDescription: The number of calories that come from carbohydrates, measured per gram of the item

CB.longDescription: List of brands that are compatible with the item

CCP.longDescription: Indicates if the item supports color or gray scale [i.e. printers]

CCW.longDescription: Indicates if the item or components of the item contain composite wood and if applicable, describes the kind of composite wood

CDI.longDescription: Number of coaxial digital inputs on a device

CDO.longDescription: Number of coaxial digital outputs on a device

CFBN.longDescription: Describes the form of coffee consumed by the item

CFN.longDescription: Indicates if the itme contains caffeine, also describes the type and amount

CH.longDescription: Indicates if the item is a choking hazard

CHEM.longDescription: Indicates if the item or components of the item contains one or more chemical

CHGT.longDescription: Indicates the device or battery that the item charges and provides any associated measurements

CHMR.longDescription: Indicates resistance to damage caused by contact with chemicals

CHR.longDescription: Describes a ficticious person or thing marked on the item

CHST.longDescription: Measurement of the chest of the item

CHZM.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains a material that is deemed hazardous

CI.longDescription: Instructions regarding the care of the item

CL.longDescription: Type of closure on the item

CLAT.longDescription: Indicates the type of accessory used for adorning, decorating, or as an ornament on an article of clothing.

CLD.longDescription: Indicates if the item is coiled

CLDM.longDescription: Indicates if the item is capable of maintaining cold temperatures, describes the type of cold maintenance product that the item represents, and provides any associated measurements

CLGR.longDescription: Describes the type of grind on the golf club

CLLO.longDescription: Describes where the closure is on the item

CLNB.longDescription: The number or letters used to identify a club

CLPT.longDescription: Indicates the type of clamp that the item is, or the type of clamp used by the item

CLSO.longDescription: Indicates if the item is a close-out item, either to reduce stock or is specifically marketed as a close-out item.

CLSW.longDescription: Indicates if the item comes with a color swatch

CMFL.longDescription: Describes the type of floor the product can be used on

CMPR.longDescription: Describes the type of compressor the item uses

CNDL.longDescription: Describes the style of the candle and provides any associated measurements

CNDT.longDescription: Count the number of conductors the item has and describes the material of the conducters

CNMD.longDescription: Describes the method used when the item is put together

CNS.longDescription: Instructions on how to prepare or store an item

CO.longDescription: Describes the style of collars for a product [i.e. shirts, dog collars]

CON.longDescription: Indicates the condition your product is in

CONM.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains Tin, Tantalum, Tungsten, or Gold, which are extracted from conflict zones, and identifies which of the minerals are present

CONV.longDescription: Indicates if an item is intended for a convention

COO.longDescription: The country associated with where the component parts were made

COOP.longDescription: Identifies the component in relation to its country of origin

COP.longDescription: Indicates if an item can be collapsed or compressed without losing structure or integrity

COSM.longDescription: Indicates if the item is used as part of a cosmetic treatment and describes the treatment it is used for

COSU.longDescription: Indicates if the item can be sold at the retail level to the consumer.  This may or may not be the same as the Base Unit

COUR.longDescription: Indicates if the item is restricted from sale and in which counties

COV.longDescription: Estimates how much area the product will cover

CPMR.longDescription: Indicates whether or not the item requires reporting of the quarterly CA Pest Mill Assessment. For more information visit: https://www.cdpr.ca.gov/docs/mill/masesmnu.htm

CPRN.longDescription: Indicates if the item uses compression to function properly and describes the type of compression

CR.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains refrigerant

CRCT.longDescription: Count of circuits included with the item, describes the type of circuit, and indicates if the circuits are protected

CRDI.longDescription: Indicates if the item comes with an electrical cord

CRDL.longDescription: Indicates if the item is cordless

CRS.longDescription: Describes the type of car seat

CSET.longDescription: Describes the type of container used to store or house another item

CSHN.longDescription: Describes cushioning used in an item

CSMT.longDescription: Indicates if the item is used as part of a cosmetic treatment and describes the treatment it is used for

CSTP.longDescription: Describes the type of cosmetic equipment, tools, or supplies the product represents

CSTR.longDescription: Describes the type of caster that is used, or can be used, with the product

CSUB.longDescription: Indicates if the item or components of the item contains one or more controlled substance

CTCM.longDescription: Indicates a certification claim by a trading partner that is not corroborated by a 3rd party agency

CTMP.longDescription: The color temperature value of a light source

CTNG.longDescription: Describes the type of special coating applied to the item

CTRS.longDescription: Indicates if the item is restricted from sale and in which countries

CUPS.longDescription: Number of cups included with the item and describes the cup

CUS.longDescription: Indicates if an item can be customized or personalized and a description of how it can be customized or personalized

CVI.longDescription: Indicates if a device supports component video and the number of inputs

CVO.longDescription: Indicates if a device supports component video and the number of outputs

CW.longDescription: List of products that are compatible with the item

CWY.longDescription: List year[s] of the products that are compatible with the item

DCRS.longDescription: Describes the style or decoration the item aligns with

DESR.longDescription: Person or entity who creates a certain collection or group of items

DIM.longDescription: Indicates if the item can be dimmed

DIS.longDescription: Describes the measurements and display technology of the item

DLCC.longDescription: Indicates if the item has been tested and approved at a DesignLights Consortium laboratory

DLCT.longDescription: Indicates if the item includes additional downloadable content

DNC.longDescription: List of potential ingredients not in the product that may be undesireable or could cause health or safety issues

DOOR.longDescription: Number of doors the item contains and descibes the type of door

DRCF.longDescription: Describes the door layout on the item

DRP.longDescription: Indicates if an item can be drop shipped and if so where

DRPL.longDescription: Describes where the drain is located on the item

DRS.longDescription: Indicates if an item can be direct ship and if so where

DRSG.longDescription: Describes the direction that the item's door will open

DRST.longDescription: Describes the type of drain system used by the item

DS.longDescription: Describes the style or length of the dress or skirt

DSP.longDescription: Indicates if the item can be disposed of after use

DSR.longDescription: Describes the marketing terminology for the resolution display of the item

DUCT.longDescription: Indicates if the item is ducted

DUR.longDescription: Measurement of the hardness of the item's material on the Durometer scale

DVDC.longDescription: Indicates if the item is capable of playing DVDs

DVTR.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains a diverter and describes the type used

DWRM.longDescription: Describes the material used in the construction of the drawer

DYE.longDescription: Describes the method used to dye the item

DYGM.longDescription: Indicates whether or not a represented gemstone has been dyed

DYOW.longDescription: The day of the week that the product is to be used

EBP.longDescription: Describes where the item should be installed

ECAE.longDescription: Indicates that the product meets the requirements from an environmentally friendly third party program, and identifies the third party

ECCN.longDescription: The 5 character alpha-numeric code used to identify dual-use items for export control purposes, as defined by the Department of Commerce

ED.longDescription: Measurement or description of the pendant of an earring

EDT.longDescription: Edition of a product [i.e. books, magazines]

EDUF.longDescription: Describes the educational or intructional subject matter that the item features

EF.longDescription: Describes the means of which the media product is delivered to the consumer

EKO.longDescription: The number of prestamped sections in electrical junction boxes that can be easily removed to provide access for fitting or cables

ELAJ.longDescription: Measures the amount of adjustments that can be made vertically to an eyepiece

ELMD.longDescription: Describes the various programs available as an integral part of the item

END.longDescription: Testimonial from or promoted by a person, group, or team on a featured item

ENTT.longDescription: Describes the type of engine treatment the product performs and provides any associated measurements.

EPB.longDescription: Indicates the number of breakers the electric panel contains

ESRB.longDescription: Rating associated with the item as assigned by the Entertainment Software Rating Board

EXPP.longDescription: Measures and describes the exit pupil within the eyepiece

EYOB.longDescription: Measures and describes an optical device's light-admitting apparatus

EYR.longDescription: Indicates how far away the eye should be from a lens to promote optimal functionality

FA.longDescription: Describes the face angle of an item and if it can be modified [i.e. golf clubs, hockey sticks]

FAAC.longDescription: Describes the mechanism of a firearm that is responsible for loading, firing, and ejecting ammunition

FACB.longDescription: Describes the internal diameter, or bore, of the barrel of a firearm

FAN.longDescription: The name of the animal whose fur was used in the item. If faux, include fabric and percentages

FATY.longDescription: Indicates the category of firearm the item belongs to

FB.longDescription: Description of features and benefits of the item

FBRT.longDescription: Indicates the number of turns per inch the yarn fibers are twisted in a product. Also describes the type of twist

FBT.longDescription: Describes the type of fiber used with the item

FCS.longDescription: Describes the kinds of focal affordances intrinsic to the item

FCT.longDescription: Country of origin of the fur for an item

FCTS.longDescription: Describes the style of the faucet

FCTT.longDescription: Describes the type of the faucet

FDF.longDescription: Describes the form[s] of food as purchased by the consumer

FDSP.longDescription: Indicates the FEDAS Product Classification Key as defined by the Sporting Goods Industry Data Harmonization Organization's standard. For more information, visit https://www.sgidho.com/SitePages/Product%20Classification%20Key.aspx.

FDSS.longDescription: Indicates the FEDAS Size Range code as defined by the Sporting Goods Industry Data Harmonization Organization's standard. For more information, visit https://www.sgidho.com/SitePages/Size%20Range%20Concept%20%20Overview.aspx.

FERT.longDescription: Indicates if the item is fertilizer and describes what the item fertilizes

FF.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains faux fur

FIT.longDescription: Measures the thread size of the fitting inlet

FLCH.longDescription: Describes the material of the component responsible for aerodynamically stabilizing the flight of a projectile and provides any associated measurements

FLM.longDescription: Describes the type of material used to fill the item.  Should not be used to describe insulative properties

FLNG.longDescription: Measures and describes the items flange

FLV.longDescription: Description of the flavor of a product

FLX.longDescription: Describes how much an item bends when force is applied

FOG.longDescription: Indicates if the item has been treated to resist fog

FOOT.longDescription: Describes the form and orthotic use for the item

FOT.longDescription: Measures the thread size of the fitting outlet

FOVA.longDescription: The angle of the field of vision when viewed through an eyepiece

FOVH.longDescription: Describes how much area is in sight through a magnification item, focused on one hundred yards

FOVT.longDescription: Describes how much area is in sight through a magnification item, focused on one thousand yards

FRME.longDescription: Describes and measures the material of the item's frame, if different than the ProductMaterialDescription

FRML.longDescription: Indicates if the item's edge is frameless

FRRT.longDescription: Indicates that the item is described as fire resistant. This does not indicate conformance to any particular regulation

FSC.longDescription: Describes the color of the face shield of an item

FSHL.longDescription: Indicates if the item comes equipped with a flashlight

FT.longDescription: Description of how the fur is treated

FTEX.longDescription: Describes the nature of a surface's roughness and waviness

FTSK.longDescription: Describes the shank of a shoe or boot

FUE.longDescription: Describes the type of fuel the item uses to function

FUEC.longDescription: Indicates if a fuel container is included with an item

FW.longDescription: The actual weight of fiber used to manufacture carpeting or rugs

FWC.longDescription: Indicates if the footwear has cleats and describes the type of cleat

FWUP.longDescription: Indicates the material that the part of an article of footwear above the sole is composed of and provides any associated measurements

FZCF.longDescription: Indicates if the item has a freezer, and describes where on the item the freezer is located

GCBC.longDescription: Measures the angle between the ground and leading edge of the golf club when set at proper address

GCTP.longDescription: Indicates the category of products or services that the gift card can be used for

GDAJ.longDescription: Indicates if the item has adjustable guides

GEM.longDescription: Describes the type of gemstone used in the item and measures the standard carat weight

GEN.longDescription: Describes the general category of the media item

GFAH.longDescription: Indicates if the golf club angles can be customized

GMCL.longDescription: Indicates the clarity of a represented gemstone according to the GIA grading scale. Quantity and severity of inclusions increase as numbers increase in this scale.

GMCT.longDescription: The shape and faceting into which a gemstone is cut. While there is no set associated with this attribute, we suggest that users use the following values: Block; Bullet; Cushion; Heart; Irregular; Marquise; Octagon; Other; Oval; Pear; Pieces/crushed; Princess; Radiant; Rectangle; Round; Round checkerboard; Slice; Square; Trapezoid; Trillion

GMOC.longDescription: Indicates whether the gemstone being represented is naturally-occurring (mined) or not (lab-created)

GMSH.longDescription: Describes the basic face-up shape of the finished gemstone [Note: This is distinct from Gemstone Cut, which describes the style and arrangement of the facets that are cut into the stone

GNBX.longDescription: Indicates the number of components the item can accommodate. Typically used with electrical or wiring

GPC.longDescription: The Global Product Classification number assigned to the item represented. More information available at http://www.gs1.org/gpc

GPS.longDescription: Indicates if the item is capable of using the global positioning system, indicates the type of GPS system the product uses, and provides any associated measurements

GR.longDescription: Describes the number and type of gear(s) associated with the item

GRD.longDescription: Describes the quality of the product

GRDL.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains a griddle

GRLL.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains a grill

GRP.longDescription: Indicates the composition and material used to comprise a grip when grasping an object

GRRT.longDescription: Amount of rotations needed for the driven gear to rotate as much as the driver gear

GTHD.longDescription: Indicates if the item's fabric is gathered and describes the type of gather

GTRC.longDescription: Measures and describes the grout recommended to be used with the item

HA.longDescription: Indicates if a hanger is included with the item and a description of the hanger

HAN.longDescription: Indicates the specified hand usage of the item

HB.longDescription: Measurement or description of the brim of the hat

HC.longDescription: Measurement or description of the crown of the hat

HCNC.longDescription: Describes the general health problem the item is intended to address

HD.longDescription: Describes the interface and size of the hard drive

HDAJ.longDescription: Indicates if the item has adjustable heads

HDFH.longDescription: Describes the finish of the item's hardware

HDMI.longDescription: Number of HDMI inputs. If applicable, indicates that a port is bidirectional

HDWR.longDescription: Describes the type of hardware used with the item

HE.longDescription: Indicates a measurement or describes the type of heel style of a shoe

HEAD.longDescription: Indicates a measurement or description of the head of an item.

HEAT.longDescription: Indicates if the item radiates heat

HEFF.longDescription: Indicates if the item is rated as high efficiency

HEPA.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains a HEPA filter

HF.longDescription: Describes how the hat fits on the top of the head

HLES.longDescription: Number of holes the item contains

HM.longDescription: Indicates if the item can be custom molded with the use of heat

HMC.longDescription: Describes the color of the facemask or cage of an item

HNBG.longDescription: Describes the style and type of handbag

HND.longDescription: The number of handles an item has and describes the handles

HNSW.longDescription: Indicates the item was sewn by a person rather than manufactured by any other means

HPR.longDescription: Horse power rating for an item

HRRM.longDescription: Describes the method employed by the item for the removal of hair

HRTD.longDescription: Describes the morphological hair type associated with a represented item

HRTP.longDescription: Indicates morphological hair type associated with a represented item [i.e. according to the Andre Walker system]

HSD.longDescription: Measurement of the strap or handle

HSLC.longDescription: Indicates where on the body the holster is intended to be worn, and provides any associated measurements

HTEL.longDescription: Describes the type of heating element that the item uses

HTRS.longDescription: Indicates resistance to wear caused by exposure to excessive heat

HTSY.longDescription: Describes the heating system the item uses

HYP.longDescription: Indicates if the item is hypoallegenic

IED.longDescription: Extended description associated with an item

IGNT.longDescription: Describes the type of igniter that the item uses

IING.longDescription: Components that not do biologicallly activate the product effectiveness

IMA.longDescription: Indicates if the item must be labeled as imitation according to the Food and Drug Administration

IME.longDescription: Amount and size of memory included with the system. This does not take into account upgrades installed at the time of purchase or later

IMG.longDescription: The measurements and orientation of an image

INCL.longDescription: Indicates if the item includes an inclinometer or clinometer

INDM.longDescription: Indicates that the included measurements are for the inside of the item [i.e. Stove, Freezer]

INDU.longDescription: Indicates if the item is intended for industrial purposes

INF.longDescription: Indicates if the item can be inflated

INFR.longDescription: Indicates if the item has infared capabilities

ING.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains ingredients and describes all components [active and inactive] that make up the product

INGL.longDescription: Indicates that the item contains a list of ingredients

INGP.longDescription: Describes the presence or non-presence of a specific ingredient. Typically used for marketing purposes

INKA.longDescription: Describes the ink application method used by the item and provides any associated measurements

INLG.longDescription: Describes the language printed on the items instructions

INLR.longDescription: Indicates the inlet size recommended for best use of the item

INS.longDescription: Measurements of the inseam of an item

INSL.longDescription: Describes the make-up of the insole of the item

INTS.longDescription: Method or process that may be used to install the item

INVU.longDescription: Indicates that the item would be invoiced in the same unit of measure as it was ordered, at its current hierarchy level

ISL.longDescription: Indicates if an item is insulated and the type of insulation

ISLR.longDescription: The items resistance to heat transfer

ISLW.longDescription: Describes the thickness of insulation within the item, commonly expressed as grams per square meter.  NOTE: This is NOT a measure of the total weight of the insulation material

ITR.longDescription: Description of item for a cash register display

ITS.longDescription: Second level of trade name/brand name; can be a trademark

ITTR.longDescription: Indicates if the item requires the use of an inner tube, offers further description of the item's inner tube requirements, and provides any associated measurements

JKLG.longDescription: Measures the coat or jacket from the shoulder seam to the bottom of the garment

JMRL.longDescription: Indicates if the item has a release mechanism for jams and describes the mechanism

JNK.longDescription: The value of the Janka Hardness Test in pounds-force

KIWA.longDescription: Indicates if the item is used for food preparation, indicates the type of kitchen equipment the item represents, and provides any associated measurements

KNSC.longDescription: Describes the material that the scales, or handle, of a knife are made of and provides any associated measurements

KP.longDescription: The point of an object in which the greatest amount of bend/flex is observed

KSHR.longDescription: Indicates if the item is kosher

KT.longDescription: A unit of purity for gold jewelry

KYBD.longDescription: Describes the type of keyboard used by the item

KYSZ.longDescription: Describes the size of keys the item has

LADR.longDescription: Describes the type of apparatus used to climb up and down and provides any associated measurements

LAUC.longDescription: Measures and describes the launch angle of the item

LCKT.longDescription: Indicates if the item is produced in a licensed kitchen and describes the type of kitchen

LCNS.longDescription: Indicates if the item is officially licensed by an external organization [i.e. Apparel licensed by the NFL, NBA, MLB, Disney, etc.]

LEA.longDescription: Description of the league associated with an item

LFST.longDescription: Describes the age grouping for which the item is intended to be used

LI.longDescription: Describes the lie of an item and if it can be modified [i.e. golf clubs, hockey sticks]

LLA.longDescription: Indicates if laws relating to content of lead apply to the item

LMM.longDescription: Long marketing message associated with the product [business-to-consumer]

LMTD.longDescription: Indicates if the item is in an early pre-production, or pre-sale stage where minimal product data is available

LN.longDescription: Description of the material the lining is made from [Include percentages, if applicable]

LO.longDescription: Measurement of the bottom leg opening [i.e. pants, shorts, skirts, etc.]

LOCK.longDescription: Indicates if the item can lock and describes the type of lock used

LOF.longDescription: Describes how much product can be shipped when neither weight nor cube can be used alone

LQD.longDescription: Indicates if the item or components of the item contain liquid

LS.longDescription: Measures the lens and describes the material it is made from

LSCR.longDescription: Describes the color of the lens

LSCT.longDescription: Describes the coating used on the lens

LSR.longDescription: Describes the color of the laser emitted by the item

LT.longDescription: Describes the loft of an item and if it can be modified [i.e. golf clubs]

LTS.longDescription: Indicates if the item could have variances based on the production lot

LUBE.longDescription: Indicates if the item is used as a lubricant, indicates what it is intended it lubricate, and provides any associated measurements

MAK.longDescription: Manufacturer or company that produces a product. Could also be the trade name [i.e. a car make would be Toyota]

MARR.longDescription: Indicates whether or not the British Columbia quarterly recycling fee for major appliances applies to the item. For more information visit: https://www.marrbc.ca/

MDCT.longDescription: Indicates whether or not the item is medicated, indicates the type of medication used, and provides any associated measurements

MEP.longDescription: Describes the intended use of the image

MER.longDescription: Indicates if the item or components of the item contains mercury

METL.longDescription: Indicates a wholly or partially metallic item

MF.longDescription: The size and name of a media file

MFR.longDescription: The different file formats available for an item

MGFC.longDescription: Describes the type of zoom the item can use, and also the amount it can zoom

MGNT.longDescription: Indicates if the item is magnetized

MIC.longDescription: Indicates if the item includes a microphone and describes the type

MILS.longDescription: A number that describes the essential technical requirements for a purchased materiel that is military unique or substantially modified commercial item

MKTE.longDescription: Indicates if the item is allowed to be sold on a third party marketplace

MLBN.longDescription: Identifies the type of label being shown on the product

MN.longDescription: Image name used on a website

MNLG.longDescription: Indicates if the items image or sound quality can be manually adjusted

MOD.longDescription: The grouping description of a product to distinguish the item from all other items under the same producer [i.e. a car model would be RAV4]

MODE.longDescription: Describes the modes the item features and count the number of modes

MOTN.longDescription: Indicates whether the item is capable of motion, describes the type of motion that the item is capable of, and provides any associated measurements

MOU.longDescription: Indicates if an item can be mounted and describes what is used to fasten it

MOUL.longDescription: Indicates where an item can be mounted

MOUT.longDescription: Describes what the item can attach to

MPAA.longDescription: Rating associated with the item as assigned by the Motion Picture Association of America

MPSE.longDescription: Indicates the military agency or legal classification of the entity by which the item is produced or procured

MRRR.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains a mirror

MTBR.longDescription: Indicates the branch of armed forces that the use of the item pertains to

MTCH.longDescription: Measures the the vertical and horizontal match [repeatable pattern] as well as describes the type of match used in the product. Typically seen with flooring

MTO.longDescription: Indicates if the item can be made-to-order

MTR.longDescription: Indicates the type of meter or measuring device employed by the item or as a part of a service

MU.longDescription: Image location. Typically used to denote a shortened URL or the specific extension of a root URL address

MXTP.longDescription: Describes the type of pre-made mix that the item contains and provides any associated measurements

MYE.longDescription: CCYY format of when the product was produced

MZVL.longDescription: Indicates the velocity at which the projectile exits the end of the gun's barrel.

NCKL.longDescription: Describes the top edge of the garmet, typically viewed from the front

NCKT.longDescription: Describes the type of item that is intended to be worn around the neck

NFPA.longDescription: Describes the classification of flammable or combustible liquids as defined by the National Fire Protection Association

NIGP.longDescription: The National Institute of Governmental Purchasing Comodity/Services assigned to the item represented. Use of these codes are authorized and controlled by the NIGP. More information at https://www.nigp.com

NMBO.longDescription: Used to identify the quantity of a particular object present with the product [i.e. TV has 3 HDMI inputs]

NNMK.longDescription: Indicates the item is produced to not leave behind skids or other markings

NOMF.longDescription: Measures the finished product, included wear layer, minus the backing

NPOT.longDescription: Identifies if the item can be used in non-potable applications

NS.longDescription: Measurement of the neck the item is intended for

NSFT.longDescription: Indicates whether or not a represented item emits sound as part of its design; developed in relation to toys for domestic animals

NSN.longDescription: A 13 digit numeric code identifying all the standardized materials of the item, as they have been recognized by all NATO countries

NST.longDescription: Indicates if the item can be nested within the same type of item [i.e. cups, bowls]

NVTB.longDescription: Indicates the type of night vision tube used by the item

OBS.longDescription: Indicates that the item is no longer being produced, but limited quantities are still available

OFET.longDescription: Describes the type of office equipment the product represents

OI.longDescription: Number of optical inputs an item supports

OLRS.longDescription: Indicates resistance to slipping on oil

OO.longDescription: Number of optical outputs an item supports

OPNT.longDescription: The amount of time the product should set before anything is affixed. Typically used with adhesives

OPPR.longDescription: Describes the type of prism used in the optical device

OPTR.longDescription: Describes the resolution of the optics related item. This is measured in lines per millimeter

OR.longDescription: Describes the marketing termology of the maxiumum resolution an item can output

ORDU.longDescription: Indicates if the item can be ordered at this hierarchy level

ORMD.longDescription: Indicates that the product's packaging will be marked with an ORM-D [Other Regulated Materials for Domestic Transport Only] label

ORTH.longDescription: Indicates if the item is made for orthopedic purposes

OS.longDescription: Description of the operating system on the item

OSC.longDescription: Describes the operating system[]s] the item is compatible with

OUTR.longDescription: Indicates the outlet size recommended for best use of the item

OVNS.longDescription: Descibes the style of the oven

PADD.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains padding and describes the type of padding used

PBL.longDescription: Publisher of a product [i.e. books, music, websites]

PBY.longDescription: Description of how the item is powered

PCAR.longDescription: Indicates if a prescription is required to purchase the item

PCAV.longDescription: Indicates if a prescription can be applied to the item

PCKL.longDescription: Describes the language printed on the items package

PDL.longDescription: Describes the length of the paddle

PED.longDescription: The extended description of a product line

PEST.longDescription: Indicates if the item or components of the item contains pesticide

PHPW.longDescription: Indicates the number of phases, or alternating currents, used with the item

PILG.longDescription: A list of the languages printed in product directions according to ISO 639-2 Language Codes, which standard is available here: https://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php

PL.longDescription: Indicates the measurement or description of the platform of an item [i.e. platform of a shoe or a platform of a ladder]

PLN.longDescription: Indicates that the product will use a lot number. Typically used for traceability

PLNT.longDescription: Describes the type of plant the product represents and provides any associated measurements

PLS.longDescription: Describes the cut of the pant leg

PLTD.longDescription: Indicates if the item's fabric has has pleats and describes the type of pleat

PLY.longDescription: The number of layers the item is made up of

PLYR.longDescription: The number of users or players the item is intended to be used with

PM.longDescription: Describes the method the item uses to print

PMD.longDescription: Model number of the processor for an item

PMF.longDescription: Manufacturer of the processor for an item

PNTR.longDescription: Measures the resolution a printer is capable of

PNTS.longDescription: Indicates if an item's style is flat fronted [i.e. pants, skirts]

POI.longDescription: The angle or perspective of an image

POK.longDescription: Describes the number and types of pocket[s] associated with the item

POL.longDescription: The number of sets of three-way electromagnetic windings that a motor has.

PPA.longDescription: Indicates if the retailer or distributor is able to purchase the product in less than full standard packaging

PPI.longDescription: The number of parcels a single item is shipped in

PPM.longDescription: Number of pages printed in one minute

PPUA.longDescription: Indicates whether or not unit pricing applies to the item

PRC.longDescription: Description of the number of cores a processor has

PRS.longDescription: Description of the speed of a processor

PRSB.longDescription: Describes the type of physical message board used to present information and provides any associated measurements

PRSI.longDescription: Describes the type of parasite treatment the product represents and provides any associated measurements

PRSZ.longDescription: Indicates that the product will use a serial number.  Typically used for traceability

PRTA.longDescription: Indicates if there are replacements parts available for the item

PRTG.longDescription: The number of calories that come from protein, measured per gram of the item

PRTP.longDescription: The total protein percent daily value of the item being described, represented as a real number, based on The Food and Drug Administration guidelines. See www.fda.gov

PSFT.longDescription: Provides the text of the Proposition 65 warning label present on the item

PSKU.longDescription: Indicates if the item's SKU is a parent SKU for an assortment of items.

PSO.longDescription: Description of the type of special packaging on an item

PT.longDescription: Description of the type of processor an item has

PTBL.longDescription: Indicates if the item is portable

PTCR.longDescription: Indicates if the product requires a paint stewardship assessment (PaintCare Fee), the amount of the assessment, or describes the assessment. For more information visit: https://www.paintcare.org/wp-content/uploads/docs/xx-factsheet-retailer-fee.pdf

PTLV.longDescription: Describes the degree of protection provided by the item

PTR.longDescription: Measured as the distance from the lens to the screen divided by the width of the image that will be projected

PTTY.longDescription: Indicates if the item is a domestic animal toy, describes the type of pet toy the item represents, and provides any associated measurements

PUMP.longDescription: Indicates the type of device or item used to move or displace fluids (liquids or gases) by mechanical action and provides any associated measurements

PUPL.longDescription: Measures the distance between the center of the pupils in each eye

PVL.longDescription: Indicates if the product can be sold under a private label

PYST.longDescription: Describes the style of represented panty or knicker

QTCL.longDescription: Indicates if the item is part of Import Quota Control per https://www.cbp.gov/trade/quota

QTTP.longDescription: Indicates the level, or type, of quota as defined by the U.S. Customs and Border Protection Agency

RB.longDescription: Indicates if a battery is rechargeable or if an item supports rechargeable batteries

REF.longDescription: Indicates if the item uses a reflective material and describes that material

REO.longDescription: Indicates if an item can be reordered

RETR.longDescription: Indicates if the item can be pulled or drawn back into itself

REU.longDescription: Indicates if the item is reusable

REVR.longDescription: Indicates if the item may be reversed to provide an alternate use or look

RF.longDescription: Indicates if the item will run flat or resist the effects of deflation when punctured

RFLL.longDescription: Indicates if the item can be refilled

RFTG.longDescription: Measures the distance in which the item can reach a reflective target. Typically used with lasers

RFTN.longDescription: Measures the distance in which the item can reach a non-reflective target. Typically used with lasers

RHC.longDescription: Indicates that the buyer must be certified to handle refrigerant

RI.longDescription: Indicates if an item is recyclable

RIS.longDescription: Measurement of the rough in area. For toilets, this is the distance between the outlet pipe and the wall

RL.longDescription: Describes the style of reel the item uses

RM.longDescription: Indicates and describes the recycled material the item is made up of [Include percentages, if applicable]

RMCT.longDescription: Indicates if the item comes with a remote control

RMHO.longDescription: Indicates the presence of a removable hood

RMVI.longDescription: Indicates if the insole of the item is removeable

RNI.longDescription: Describes additional items that are required to use the item, but are not included

RP.longDescription: Indicates if the item comes in recyclable packaging

RPCK.longDescription: Indicates if the items package is derived from recycled materials

RPCP.longDescription: Indicates if the item can be used as part of a recipe for food preparation, and describes the type of recipe component represented by the item

RPLN.longDescription: Indicates if the item is non-replenishable [i.e.cannot be fulfilled again after the initial fulfillment due to seasonality, limited stock, one time promotion, etc.]

RPM.longDescription: The number of rotations around a fixed axis in one minute

RSR.longDescription: Describes why an item is restricted

RST.longDescription: Describes the level of roasting the product has had

RTC.longDescription: Describes what type of return policy is applicable for the item
examples: Destroy for credit or Return for credit

RTCC.longDescription: Describes the color of the reticle object in an eyepiece

RTCL.longDescription: Describes the shape or formation of the target indicator

RTE.longDescription: Indicates if the item is designated as Ready-To-Eat, as defined by the Food and Drug Administration

RUL.longDescription: Describes where an item is intended to be used

SADJ.longDescription: Indicates that the height of the seat of a product can be adjusted [Yes, No]

SAG.longDescription: Categorizes the grouping of ages in a non-numeric form

SAJM.longDescription: Indicates the Minimum height of the seat of an item when fully collapsed

SBBT.longDescription: Indicates if the item has sabbath mode functionality

SBFL.longDescription: Measures and describes the type of subfloor to be used with the item

SBJ.longDescription: Subject of written work [i.e. books, magazines]

SBR.longDescription: Indicates if the item has a signal booster

SCAV.longDescription: Indicates the sales channel(s) in which the item is available for sale

SCK.longDescription: The number of sockets an item has

SCKB.longDescription: Indicates if the item or its package can be stacked without causing damage

SCL.longDescription: Describes the measurement from the top of the item, down the back side to where the item meets the ground in the playing position. Typically used in sporting goods [i.e. Golf Clubs, Hockey Sticks]

SCNT.longDescription: Description of the scent of a product

SCPR.longDescription: Describes the type of scented hygene product the item contains and provides any associated measurements

SCRG.longDescription: Describes the material that the item's scope ring is made of and provides any associated measurements

SEAT.longDescription: Describes the material of the product's seat and measurements of the seat

SECT.longDescription: An area or portion that is distinct from others

SERS.longDescription: Name, version or collection that an item is associated with

SES.longDescription: Indicates availability or describes the season of an item

SET.longDescription: A title given to a specific series [i.e. Books Series Title]

SFTM.longDescription: Describes the model of shaft used with the item

SFTP.longDescription: Type of system hardware the item runs on

SG.longDescription: Describes the level of the floor in relation to the ground

SGC.longDescription: Measures the recommended capacity limit of an item for optimal use

SGHT.longDescription: Describes and measures the adjustments available for the item [i.e Scopes]

SGLU.longDescription: Indicates whether or not a represented item is intended for single-use

SHE.longDescription: Describes the reflection of light from the surface that is independent of color

SHF.longDescription: Describes the main balancing part of an item [i.e. golf clubs, hockey sticks, hammers]

SHHT.longDescription: Describes the type of shower head

SHIP.longDescription: Indicates that the item is able to be shipped at this hierarchy level

SHL.longDescription: Indicates if the expiration date is listed on product and the number of days till the product expires

SHLR.longDescription: Describes the types of places the product cannot be shipped to

SHP.longDescription: Describes the overall shape of the item

SHRD.longDescription: Describes the cut type the item supports

SHRP.longDescription: Describes the type of device used to make another item sharp

SIC.longDescription: Description of an item that isn't available at an individual rate

SIG.longDescription: Describes the technology used to transmit electronic signals

SJT.longDescription: Describes the jersey being worn based on the game's location

SKL.longDescription: Indicates the suggested skill level of the user

SKTM.longDescription: Indicates the skin temperament associated with the represented item. While there is no set associated with this item, we recommend the following values: oily; dry; combination; balanced; sensitive.

SKTP.longDescription: Indicates the skin type associated with the represented item on the Fitzpatrick scale

SL.longDescription: Measurements and description of the sleeve on an item

SLPR.longDescription: Indicates resistance to slipping on certain surfaces

SLPT.longDescription: Indicates if the item is intended to be worn while sleeping, describes the type of sleepwear, and provides any associated measurements

SLTL.longDescription: Measurement of the cut or opening within the item

SMC.longDescription: Indicates whether device is Smart capable

SMM.longDescription: Short marketing message associated with the item

SN.longDescription: Indicates the number of items in a consumer package [i.e. A set of pans that contains 5 pans and 3 lids]

SO.longDescription: Describes the type of material the sole is made up of

SPC.longDescription: Capacity that is measured in a non-standard unit of measure

SPCS.longDescription: Describes the species of animal the item is intended for

SPEQ.longDescription: Indicates if the item is used for recreational sporting activities, describes the type of specialized sports equipment the item represents, and provides any associated measurements

SPFR.longDescription: Indicates if the item protects against UVB rays and provides the item's Sun Protection Factor Rating

SPI.longDescription: Indicates if the speakers are integrated with the item

SPN.longDescription: Describes the position for the equipment or item being used

SPNR.longDescription: Measures and describes the spin produced by the item

SPO.longDescription: Describes the sport or activity associated with the item

SPPT.longDescription: Describes the level or type of support provided by the item

SPRC.longDescription: Indicates if the item may be shipped by a small package carrier. If it is not allowed, also describes the reason it is not allowed

SPRT.longDescription: Estimates how much area the product will cover on a per gallon basis

SRFC.longDescription: Describes the outline or form of the surface of the item

SRU.longDescription: Indicates if the item is pre-strung or not

SRVP.longDescription: Describes the service provider for the item [i.e. mobile phone provider]

SSZ.longDescription: Number of units recommended per serving

ST.longDescription: Primary gem stone associated with product. This should be identified with the size and if genuine or faux.

STCK.longDescription: Indicates if the supplier will allow a buying party to stock the item at their location

STFC.longDescription: Used to determine what type of building the item is intended for

STG.longDescription: Indicates the measurement of potency for a product

STON.longDescription: Indicates the type of stone the item is derived from and provides any associated measurements

STR.longDescription: Description of the storage needed for an item including min/max temperature, unit of measure, etc.

STRG.longDescription: Indicates the type of storage the item provides or the organizational purpose the item is intended for, and provides any associated measurements

STRP.longDescription: Indicates the number of belts and/or straps on a represented item or on a part of an item

STRS.longDescription: Indicates if the item is restricted from sale and in which state[s]

STSI.longDescription: Describes the types of status indicators the product has

SUB.longDescription: Describes the alternate title of a written work

SVC.longDescription: Number of recommended consumable servings within a container

SVD.longDescription: Number of recommended servings of a product or dosage per day

SVI.longDescription: Number of S-Video inputs on an item

SVO.longDescription: Number of S-Video outputs on an item

SW.longDescription: Description of the width of the footwear item [i.e. shoes, boots]

SWS.longDescription: Describes the type or style of a swimsuit

SWWT.longDescription: Describes the swing weight of an item [i.e. golf clubs, tennis racquets]

SYSR.longDescription: Minimum requirements needed for the item to function

TANE.longDescription: Describes the type of skin tanning equipment the product represents

TAPF.longDescription: Indicates whether or not the item is free of Talcum powder and provides any associated measurements.

TBST.longDescription: Describes the style of the tub

TCHL.longDescription: Indicates if the item features touchless technology

TCNF.longDescription: Describes the notch configuration on a trowel that is recommended to use with the item

TCTC.longDescription: Indicates if the item is suitable for law enforcement or military use

TEA.longDescription: Description of the team associated with an item

TEXT.longDescription: Indicates if the item is a type of cloth or woven fabric

TGRM.longDescription: Indicates the type of garment worn over the upper body or torso and provides any associated measurements

THD.longDescription: Indicates if the item is threaded and describes the type of threads used

THDC.longDescription: Total number of vertical and horizontal threads per square inch of a fabric

THRM.longDescription: Indicates if the item is equipped with thermal imaging capabilities

TIM.longDescription: Indicates if an image is a thumbnail version of a full-scale image

TIMR.longDescription: Indicates if the item has a built in timer or comes with a timing mechanism. Also describes the timer

TINT.longDescription: Indicates if the item is tinted, describes the type of tint used, and provides any associated measurements

TIT.longDescription: Name given to the item to identify it

TLBT.longDescription: Describes the type of box or container for keeping tools

TLI.longDescription: Tire load index associated with the item as assigned by the NHTSA[National Highway Traffic Safety Administration]

TLSC.longDescription: Indicates the number of telescoping sections on an item or on a part of an item [i.e. the back of an extendable camper, or the leg of a tripod]

TM.longDescription: The ISO country code where the item is intended to be sold [http://www.iso.org/iso/home/standards/country_codes.htm]

TMA.longDescription: Describes what material the item is intended to be used with

TMEP.longDescription: Indicates the style of timepiece that the item is, or that is used by the item, and provides any associated measurements

TMPC.longDescription: Describes the weather conditions the item is intended to mitigate

TMPL.longDescription: Measures the temple section on the frame of the glasses

TMPR.longDescription: Describes the recommended range of temperature for the item

TMPS.longDescription: Indicates if the item or components of the item are sensitive to temperature change

TOPG.longDescription: Describes the type of protective equipment to be worn on the body and provides any associated measurements.

TOS.longDescription: Indicates if an item has a touchscreen and the features of the touchscreen

TOTF.longDescription: Describes the type of device that is used to transfer electrical energy from one circuit to the next and provides any associated measurements

TP.longDescription: Description of the barrier or guard to protect the wearer from toe injury

TPL.longDescription: Describes a distinctive design, name, or symbol that is shown on the item.   This is not to be confused with a brand, league, or team logo [i.e. SPS Commerce putting its logo on a backpack]

TPMC.longDescription: Indicates the type of mechanism or movement that the item uses to keep time

TQE.longDescription: Indicates how much force is needed to rotate an object

TR.longDescription: Indicates whether an item has tamper resistant packaging

TRCF.longDescription: Describes the configuration of the plies on the inner layer of the tire and provides any associated measurements

TRDM.longDescription: A word or phrase that identifies and distinguishes the source of the item. This may or may not be a brand name

TRMC.longDescription: Describes the color of the non-structural, decorative edging of the item. This should be different from the ProductColorDescription

TRMM.longDescription: Describes the material of the non-structural, decorative edging of the item. This should be different from the ProductMaterialDescription

TRST.longDescription: Indicates if the item is resistant to tearing

TRTP.longDescription: Describes the style of turret used on the item

TS.longDescription: Describes the type of toe style on footwear

TSAR.longDescription: Indicates that the represented item is recognized in some manner by the US Transportation Security Administration. These recognitions may not be legal and are usually recorded at http://blog.tsa.gov/

TSR.longDescription: Tire speed rating associated with the item as assigned by the NHTSA[National Highway Traffic Safety Administration]

TSZ.longDescription: Describes the size of the tire

TTG.longDescription: Tire treadwear grade associated with the item as assigned by the NHTSA[National Highway Traffic Safety Administration]

TTHO.longDescription: Indicates the presence of a stowable hood

TVR.longDescription: Rating associated with the item per the TV Parental Guidelines. See http://www.tvguidelines.org/ratings.htm

TVSZ.longDescription: Indicates whether or not the represented item is travel size. While there are no business rules associated with this attribute, we recommend that users do not indicate a Y value for this attribute if items being represented have volumes which exceed 3.4 ounces

TWTP.longDescription: Indicates the type-bar action the typewriter uses and provides any associated measurements

TYCT.longDescription: Indicates if the item is a toy and describes the category of children's entertainment that the item belongs to.

UIST.longDescription: Provides instructions regarding how to use the item

UNDW.longDescription: Indicates whether or not the item has an underwire.

UNIV.longDescription: Indicates if the item is capable of unversal usage [i.e. adjustable to or appropriate for all requirements; not restricted to a single purpose or position]

UNSPSC.longDescription: The United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC) assigned to the item represented. More information available at https://www.unspsc.org

UPD.longDescription: The amount of material an item uses or consumes per day [i.e. diesel fuel]

UPH.longDescription: The amount of material an item uses or consumes per hour [i.e. diesel fuel]

USB.longDescription: Number of USB connections on an item

USDA.longDescription: Identifies if the item is subject to inspection by the United states Department of Agriculture

VARP.longDescription: Indicates if the item can be sold in variations, and also describes the primary variation of the item

VARS.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains a secondary variation, and also describes the variation of the item

VART.longDescription: Indicates if the item contains a tertiary variation, and also describes the variation of the item

VHSC.longDescription: Indicates if the item is capable of playing VHS tapes

VID.longDescription: A unique identifier used to classify groups of associated item variants

VMT.longDescription: Describes the message used by a vendor for a marketing promotion

VNTS.longDescription: Describes the style of venting unit used by the item

VOC.longDescription: Relating to organic chemicals which exhibit high vapor pressure at ordinary room temperature, resulting in large numbers of molecules evaporating into the surrounding air.

VRSN.longDescription: Describes the version of the item

VRTL.longDescription: Further defines what the item is, when it can come in many varieties. Typically used with grocery items

VVTP.longDescription: Identifies the type of valve the item uses or requires

VW.longDescription: Indicates if the item can be purchased or invoiced by weight, and the weight may fluctuate.  Typically seen with perishable foods

WAC.longDescription: Indicates a measurement or description of the case

WAI.longDescription: Measurements of the circumference of the waist or hip

WAIR.longDescription: Describes how the material falls on the waist

WAR.longDescription: Indicates if an item has a warranty and a description of the warranty for the final consumer

WARD.longDescription: Describes the length of the warranty and what the warranty covers

WAS.longDescription: Indicates a measurement or description of the band or strap

WB.longDescription: Describes what is used to adjust the waist of the item

WDAJ.longDescription: Measures the amount of adjustments that can be made horizontally to an eyepiece

WEAP.longDescription: Indicates the type of weapon the item is meant to be used with

WEHC.longDescription: Indicates whether or not the item requires reporting for the monthly Washington state environmental handling charge

WI.longDescription: Indicates if the item has Wi-Fi technology and describes the frequency

WL.longDescription: Measures and describes the wear layer of the product

WNDP.longDescription: Indicates if an item is windproof and a description of the specifications

WNDR.longDescription: Indicates if an item is wind resistant and a description of the specifications

WOOD.longDescription: Indicates if the item or components of the item contain wood and if applicable, describes the kind of wood

WOR.longDescription: The minimum and maximum allowed size of a window

WP.longDescription: Measures and describes the type of webbing the item uses

WPF.longDescription: Indicates if an item is waterproof and a description of the specifications

WR.longDescription: Indicates if an item is water resistant and a description of the specifications

WRKT.longDescription: The amount of time that the product can be used after setting. Typically used with adhesives

WRN.longDescription: Indicates if an item contains a warning and a description of the warning

WRNI.longDescription: Describes the types of warning indicators the product has

WRUT.longDescription: Indicates the type of writing utensil that the item is, or that the item contains, and provides any associated measurements

WTRP.longDescription: Indicates if the item is weather proof and a description of the multiple weather elements it can withstand

WTRR.longDescription: Indicates if the item is weather resistant and a description of the multiple weather elements it can withstand

ValueUOM.description: The unit of measure of the numeric value of the ItemAttributeQualifier

AM.longDescription: A sealed glass capsule containing a liquid

DB.longDescription: Weight of the item when dry.  Qualifier should only be used if distinction is needed between pounds and dry pounds [i.e. pounds of wet cement vs. dry cement]

DD.longDescription: Used to describe angles. This is not to be used to describe temperatures.

DE.longDescription: Equal to 1.375 cubic feet in the United States. Typically used to measure wood

DWT.longDescription: Used in the valuation and measurement of precious metals. Equal to 24 grains, 120 of a troy ounce, and 1.55517384 grams.

FZ.longDescription: Equal to 1/20 of an Imperial Pint, or 28.416 milliliters

JO.longDescription: Usually used for ordering pipe. In this context a joint is a section of pipe, usually of predetermined length.

LS.longDescription: Often used when a sum is pre-negotiated outside of an order

PER.longDescription: The proportion or share in relation to the whole.

PSI.longDescription: Pressure a gas or liquid exerts on the walls of its container

Q1.longDescription: One of a set of four 3-month divisions of a year

VAR.longDescription: A unit that is used to measure reactive power in AC circuits

ZC.longDescription: One of two 6-month divisions of a year

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

YesOrNoResponse.description: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

items.description: Details various systems of measuring and their values

MeasurementQualifier.description: Code identifying a specific product to which a measurement applies

CNSM.longDescription: The amount of consumable contents the item contains

CVOL.longDescription: The amount an item can hold in volume

CWHT.longDescription: The amount an item can hold in weight

DMD.longDescription: Measure of the average rate at which your home or business consumes electricity in a defined time interval

MLFN.longDescription: Denotes the purity of a precious metal alloy by parts per thousand of pure metal by mass in the alloy [i.e a sample that is 75% pure is denoted as 750]

SND.longDescription: The amount of sound an item can produce

MeasurementValue.description: A numerical value associated with MeasurementQualifier

CompositeUOM.description: The unit of measure used in relation to all values in the measurement group

DB.longDescription: Weight of the item when dry.  Qualifier should only be used if distinction is needed between pounds and dry pounds [i.e. pounds of wet cement vs. dry cement]

DD.longDescription: Used to describe angles. This is not to be used to describe temperatures.
